name: Explosive Circuit
description:
Help:
Click on the grey access nodes to open a menu of options.

DESCRIPTION
This is a short game made in 2018's Extra Credits Game Jam, with the theme of Awesome per Second. All assets were created by me except for:

  • Spider Talent font, by Chequered Ink

Software used:

  • Godot
  • Gimp 2
  • Git
